d:
Cute and lewd Oppai-loli x Shota original H doujin by Hanbun Kyojaku.
Scanlated by Tabunne Scans.

raw: https://e-hentai.org/g/3219334/7fe22690ab/

Everyone was a bit busy around the New Year's but now we're back with hopefully relatively frequent uploads. We discussed about collabbing with another team on some of our projects, and that should help us both in getting stuff done, let's hope everything will go smooth about it~!

Now now, as for the doujin, it's a clueless oppai-loli with a clueless shota! some bratty childhood friends rivarly quickly escalated into lewd XD lol but as both of them are totally clueless, they didn't quite get what happened XD lol But they're having fun, so I guess it's all good XD lol

It has clothed and naked versions for part 1 & 2 - part 3 has only naked version since they're in the bathroom getting ready to take a bath. the raws have textless (bubble-less) version too, but there's probably no point in including that here?

We also picked up some other doujins as well from this author, so with some luck, look forward to them as well, hopefully soon.

Anyway, enough blabbering, right?
I hope you enjoy reading it~!
n: [Doujinshi] [Hanbun Kyojaku] skeb de Kaita Shirokuro Manga! | A Black-And-White Manga I Drew on Skeb! [English] [Tabunne Scans] [KZ Scan]
